website_summaries.verdict: With a range of magnification lenses, a feather-light build, glasses-friendly design, and an extra-bright LED light, the Fancii is definitely worth your consideration.
pros: Includes 5 easily swappable magnification lenses: 1-, 1.5-, 2-, 2.5-, and 3.5-times
LED light is 30% brighter than incandescent lightbulbs
cons: This headband magnifier rests on the bridge of your nose

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! This comes with 5 different magnifying levels, can be used as 'glasses' or you can take off the arms and put on an adjustable headband. The light is great for my needs - counted cross stitch and needlepoint - and this is very comfortable. Another nice feature is that there is space between the lens and the top, so if you want to look up and catch something on TV, etc, you don't have to take off the magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: Mommak

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found.
customer_reviews.text: It is a definite improvement over what i used before. I paint military miniatures and need high magnification. This product worked nicely. My only criticism is that it is somewhat uncomfortable to wear for long periods. It is mostly too tight. I have to take it off after about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Allen E. Lawton

customer_reviews.title: wide viewing is better
customer_reviews.text: After trying several products to magnify miniature projects, I bought these. I first avoided them because they appeared clunky but, now that I have tried them, they work great. Viewing through these "glasses" is way better than the loupe approach. A wide field of vision is required when working because all your stuff is not in a 1" circle.. They are still clunky but surprisingly comfortable. They help get the job done, Apple needs to equip their repair techs with these things. If you are contemplating changing your iPhone battery, you need these. My wife is going to use them for her sewing adventures.
customer_reviews.author: DocWild

customer_reviews.title: This works very well and is not too heavy to ...
customer_reviews.text: This works very well and is not too heavy to wear. Unfortunately the part of the headset that grips the interchangeable lens seems to stretch or wear with time. I always take the lens out and store to protect it. With several months of use the lens would fall out while I was wearing it and this last time the attachment portion of the 3.5 lens broke off and I can no longer use it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M.

customer_reviews.title: I have tried several different magnifiers and without a doubt these are the best and most cost effective
customer_reviews.text: I have macular degeneration and need reading assistance. I have tried several different magnifiers and without a doubt these are the best and most cost effective. You can read and watch tv or see your surroundings with out adjusting the Fancil headband
customer_reviews.author: terry eddings

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Best magnification headband I have ever bought. Well constructed and comfortable to wear. I highly recommend this to anyone who needs to see their work better. And the light makes it that much better. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with everything about this head magnifier 😎👍🏼⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint would be that it doesn’t have a soft bag to store it all in, but I’ve kept the box and just put it on my bookshelf. The unit is very comfortable and the different lenses are PERFECT. The LED light is that crisp warm bluish tint, making it great for detail. It’s a comfortable 5 star rating from me. 😁👍🏼⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Cool product. I was looking at a much more expensive option to improve my field of vision to do needlework and decided to try this first. It works very well and I love the little LED light incorporated into it! The only thing I notice is some eye fatigue, but I think that is inevitable with any of the magnifying options. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: A WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: ALL THE WEIGHT RESTS ON THE BRIDGE OF THE NOSE. IT IS WAY TOO UNCOMFORTABLE TO WEAR FOR MORE THAN ABOUT 5 MINUTES. A WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Old Pink 1944

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product! It is lightweight, yet performs at a level you would expect from a more intrusive headset. The magnification is excellent and extensive given that you have five panels to choose from. They are easily inserted and very effective.
customer_reviews.author: ellenghw

customer_reviews.title: Superb solution for close-up work
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent solution. I'm a computer hardware tech and working on the internal components of a laptop require some significant magnification and adequate lighting and this device does both. I love the various power options and how quickly you can swap out lenses. Note: It is also extremely comfortable. The nose-piece, although a little bulky and doesn't fold/collapse somehow to decrease the storage size, is very comfortable even for extended use. Excellent design and execution.
customer_reviews.author: Andy L.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it....seems well designed and an excellent value. Comfortable fit, easy to change the lenses to different magnifications, and easy to make adjustments in the tilt of the lens to aim towards your work. The built in light is a nice feature. I believe this design is more comfortable than the bands wrapping around your head.
customer_reviews.author: VT Scooper

customer_reviews.title: Getting old but still working on guitar amps.
customer_reviews.text: Made it a lot easier to see the values of components that I was working with. Just by tilting your head you can change the view, don't have to keep flipping the lens up and down. With the different lenses you have a choice of the needed magnification. Wish it used the smaller 2032 size batteries, as most things do now days, cuts down on the weight. But with the AAA's you can use rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Rick O. Jones

customer_reviews.title: these are handy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I had cataract surgery 10 years ago so my eyes do not focus well and there are lots of times that I am working on something that getting some more magnification would be nice. I really like these. They are light on my head but it seems sturdy. The set of lenses comes in a nice carrying case. I've used them when soldering and when pulling splinters out of my fingers and they really made difference.
customer_reviews.author: mach*pilot

customer_reviews.title: The magnification for reading is great. My only negative is that the glasses get ...
customer_reviews.text: The magnification for reading is great. My only negative is that the glasses get uncomfortable on the bridge of the nose.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Takes a little while to get them adjusted to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little while to get them adjusted to my head and eyesight. But, now Its all set and I just put them on and change the magnification and go.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Dimaio

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a negative I would! This thing is so heavy it’s unwearable!!! Wore for not even a minute and my nose was hurting from the weight of this thing! Someone needs to go back to the drawing board on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I used these today to solder some very small automotive wires. The lens come in a case that is slotted to keep them in order. I was able to one hand pick what lens I needed depending on the place I was working. The lens slides into a slot on the head gear and stays there until done. easy to manage and store (I just keep in original box).
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bologna

customer_reviews.title: These glasses were a great help - both in magnifying and in lighting the ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog walked through a nymph tick nest, and I needed to remove a couple hundred pin-head sized ticks from her belly. These glasses were a great help - both in magnifying and in lighting the area. She's low to the ground and often comes home with ticks, so previously I'd hold a flashlight in my mouth so I had both hands for tweezers and ruffling her hair. The lighted glasses make the process a whole lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: CGoldman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Works great for using in painting Dungeons & Dragons minatures. The magnifying lens are easy to change. Love the adjustable head lamp. As mentioned in other reviews the nose piece can become uncomfortable if using over a long period (more than one hour). I had a little lambs wool under the nose piece and now I have no issues. And I agree that you should attach the strap to hold the unit securely as it is a little too heavy with just the sides looping over the ears. But I was thrilled with the whole thing at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A miracle for my sister!!
customer_reviews.text: Just gave this to my 73 year old sister for Christmas. She suffers from macular degeneration and very poor vision in general. I had been watching her hunched over her newspapers with a magnifying glass for months. She had almost given up on reading her newspapers which she loves. She was thrilled beyond words when she put the glasses on with the highest magnifying glass lens. She can read the newspaper with ease. It gave me such joy to see how much this tool helped her. She said OVER and OVER this was the best present she ever received.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Powell

customer_reviews.title: This is a poorly designed toy.
customer_reviews.text: It took 30 minutes to put the batteries in - then the light didn't work. It took 20 minutes to get the ear pieces off so that I could put the head band on. I don't know what kind of animal the nose pieces are designed for - certainly not for humans. Why not just copy the nose pieces on eyeglasses? that seems to have worked for about six hundred years now. The lenses are much to small for an adult so I assume they are intended as children's toys. Do you have something hidden away somewhere for adults?
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Now you see it...
customer_reviews.text: This is a worthy purchase for anyone slightly farsighted and enjoys repairing or working on smaller items. They are extremely helpful for reading small directions that small packaged items, like chromatic tuners for example. Arrived as advertised and the packaging serves to store the product perfectly. You will get plenty years of usage due to the quality of the product and the packaging. Strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Seller
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and superb service. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis M. McCraw

customer_reviews.title: Xray vision
customer_reviews.text: I use these to read to my children at night. I can turn off the lights and still see the words. The lenses tilt forward and backward to change to the focal point somewhat. They begin to be painful on the bridge of my nose after 10-20 minutes of use. The pressure from the weight of the headband is focused on the nose cushions. I don't wear them long enough to put something softer on them. The light is super bright and uses 2-3 AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: K1

customer_reviews.title: On time, again.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived when stated and in excellent condition. I have used it very heavily and have found the complaints against it not to my disadvantage. It is easy to wear and works very well to see what I am doing. I use it primarily, so far, for reading and the led light is bright and all can be adjusted for easy viewing. Excellent product all around.
customer_reviews.author: Everett A. Haldiman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well-made
customer_reviews.text: I am a veterinarian who does extensive surgery. I bought this after my old loupe wore out. It is so comfortable, that I now wear it for all my surgeries instead of my "cheater" glasses. With the lens not resting on my nose, it doesn't fog up with my surgical mask. And, if I need more magnification, I just slip in a different lens.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Ok but has a small design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I like that the unit came with a head band. Which is really easy to attach once you get the temples off. However I had To remove the nose bridge to be able wear these when I wore them with my glasses on. The head band has two little prongs that stick into your fore head when you do this, however, making it uncomfortable. I had to add padding to over come this. Still working on a better fix.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great for jewelry work!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a metalsmith - I've been looking for better magnifiers forever, and glad I gave these a try! They are well constructed and easy to use. They are on the heavier side, but well balanced and no more cumbersome than any other magnifiers. I can use these easily on top of my glasses. The light is a super bonus! Great product for this price, I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. S. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Well-Engineered, Clearly Focused, Wide-Range of Magnification
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not utilized all of the features, such as adjusting the led lighting angle, I am very impressed with how well the 1 X magnification lens brings my entire computer screen and text into focus at a distance of about 3 feet. It defines the text more clearly than my progressive prescription glasses with less eye strain. The 3.5 X lens allows very close-up magnification if and when needed. I am still exploring all the features, but so far, I am very pleased this well-engineered, versatile product.
customer_reviews.author: HML

customer_reviews.title: Works great, needs nose bridge redesigned.
customer_reviews.text: As many others have commented the only thing I do not like is the weight on the nose. About 20 minutes is all I can take. I have spread the bridge on the nose and that helps a little. I use it as a headband, the eyeglasses configuration is not workable for me. Magnification is spot on and the LED light source is well focused. Hope they last until I get this project finished.
customer_reviews.author: Super Soaper

customer_reviews.title: A great magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: I love this magnifier. I took a long time selecting one from the many available options, and I am very satisfied with this product. It doesn't feel like I am wearing a miner's light on my head. It comes with all the lens options I will need. It is comfortable to wear and the light is nice and bright. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to help me when sewing the binding on my quilts! My only problem with this is that it weighs heavy on the nose bridge after awhile. I have to wear it on top of my glasses which pronounces the effect. That being said, light is perfect and different magnifying glasses are easy to use and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Carathren A. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work
customer_reviews.text: First I received my Fancii Magnifier a lot sooner then I thought I would get it, I used it to untangle 2 of my wife's neckless and it works great , I would have to use a magnifying glass on a stand and it worked but not that good, with my Fancii I could move my head around and it stayed on the light is awesome and helps a lot and its easy to change the lenses . and it come with a 1 YR warranty . I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: james f

customer_reviews.title: Modern Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This Fancii magnifier and LED light is a pleasure to use. Better than the old style, old school, headband magnifiers. You can change the amount of magnification by the simple system to clip in the magnifier piece of choice. Nicely packaged too. The LED light could use a little more 'ooomph' / brightness or focused output.
customer_reviews.author: Fred A. Cresce

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I paint by numbers and at 69 it ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I paint by numbers and at 69 it can be difficult to see the lines. These help a lot, this is a quality product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Flora A. & James A. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Really helps with fine details on my art work!
customer_reviews.text: I use this headband magnifier for detailed art work and just love it! It allows me to focus on my art, rather than squinting to accomplish what I need to on fine details. It has really helped me up my artwork a notch! Also good for other projects that need up close visuals. My husband thinks it’s a great tool as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bohemian Products

customer_reviews.title: Magnifying lenses
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it is designed to do but is very, very uncomfortable to wear. Downright painful on the nose! The bridge that supports all the considerable weight is very uncomfortable. It cuts into my nose and I can only wear this thing for a short period of time. I’m looking for something I can pad it with but haven’t come up with anything yet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and well suited to all kinds of close work. Comes with 5 different lenses of varying magnifications for different types of work. Can be worn with eyeglass-type frame or adjustable headband. The LED illumination is useful and quite bright. All in all, this magnifier does what it's supposed to do, and at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: For a reasonable sum of money this is a very handy device when one must magnify something to work on it with two hands. I have seen professionals with similar devices use very expensive ones. I am glad that this is available. I treat it with care as it is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: I used it yesterday and loved it. I do needlework and the bright light ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it yesterday and loved it. I do needlework and the bright light is very helpful, especially when sewing dark threads. Also, it is light weight. I have seen the type that circles your head which i don’t care for because you get hat hair. I think I’ll get another one for me and might order more for my sewing buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: The headlight being able to see what I am doing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product I think it is very well-made. However I am dissatisfied I just received it put new batteries in it and the light does not work
customer_reviews.author: harold sharer

customer_reviews.title: This magnifier gear is exceptionally good. The lenses that come with the gear give ...
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier gear is exceptionally good. The lenses that come with the gear give a wide range of choices and the fit is quite comportable. I was trying to use an antique haad band with no light and severally scratched lenses. I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jbhartin49

customer_reviews.title: I see the light
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and have made my work much more accurate. I do have to put giant padded bandaids one the bridge of my nose and one on my for forehead to ease the pain of wearing them for hours, increases my geek factor exponentially. Also the lenses can pop out onto my concrete floor very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Young

customer_reviews.title: Heavy on nose
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it is heavy on my nose after a while. so, I have limited the use until I find something to make the nose more comfortable. I am sure there is something out there I can use so it won't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Coyotess

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's a good piece of equipment I would have gave it an extra star but they don't provide you with batteries which I don't see why not but overall very good lenses helps when I'm doing key impressioning.
customer_reviews.author: dean torres

customer_reviews.title: high quality optics
customer_reviews.text: just received but trial workout is very satisfying...very good optics...clear view throughout lens...easy to change lenses...lighting exceptionally bright.
customer_reviews.author: sanjoetwo

customer_reviews.title: Ordering another right away!
customer_reviews.text: I like how many lenses come in the set, in a nice see they box, I like the bright light. And they’re made really well. I’m going to order a set for my mom and her sewing troubles from waning eyesight!
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and the variety of lenses included with ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and the variety of lenses included with the product. Am converting it from the ear pieces to the head strap and that seems to work better for me. The nose piece is not slip-proof!!!! I had to add some grips that one uses with eyeglasses to keep it from slipping. This is my portable magnifier/light for doing fine needlework.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Moms, Dads, Grandmas and Grandpas will love these.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad and he LOVES them! 😆 He would always talk about how he can’t see anything, even with his glasses! And with these, he said “AAWH MAN I WISH I CAN ALWAYS SEE LIKE THIS, these are cool, I see perfect” So there it is, he can continue doing what he loves most, working on cars. I highly recommend for anyone who struggles finding the right magnifier. Moms and dads who can’t see well will love these!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny needlework.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, as we age, our eyesight starts to creat issue with small, detailed needlework. This product has made it possible for me to continue cross stitching on 16 count material! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: 6sons

customer_reviews.title: These are stupid, but they kinda work
customer_reviews.text: If you really want to look silly you can walk around with these on your head. Do it in the privacy of your own home, OK? There is an assortment of magnification options, a close-up battery powered light, and acceptable distance adjustment. But, they are weird.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for close-up work
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for me as I wear glasses with these and they provide a great fit on bridge of nose along with my glasses. This allows me to wear them for painting miniatures while also looking over the top to watch T.V. or other distance needs. Only minor drawback is I often knock the lens out of its holder when removing them... I think this is my fault for not being more careful in how I grab them for removal.
customer_reviews.author: John Kellams

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I need the light for close up work, and I love being able to see with the magnification lenses with my hands free. The fancii stays on without falling off even without the head strap, I will use it continuously in my business and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: L Walther

customer_reviews.title: All the weight is on the bridge of the nose
customer_reviews.text: I like the light a lot but it is very heavy on the bridge of my nose. I had considered sending it back but I see so clearly I’m going to get some nose pads
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: light weight , affordable, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I Love it, i run a small computer and cell phone repair business and i had trouble seeing screws , these glasses allow me to see threading , screws , wiring etc
customer_reviews.author: Blanco843

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I’m an orthodontist it help me so much in my work light easy and flexible and clear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and they work!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my sewing projects. My only complaint is, it is nearly impossible to read the magnification level on the lens. Raised lettering on clear just doesn't work for me. Same goes for the battery compartment. Raised lettering on white plastic is very hard to decipher. Fortunately, the instruction booklet had a diagram for the installing the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Stalker

customer_reviews.title: We love this product for removing slivers/splinters
customer_reviews.text: We love this product for removing slivers/splinters. The selection of lenses is great and the light is very bright. It is very adjustable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: BlueVioletLilac

customer_reviews.title: I found one its great, light with many options
customer_reviews.text: I'm a coin collector and was always looking for the alternative to this standard grey ugly head magnifier..I found one its great, light with many options. i love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Chmielarski

customer_reviews.title: nice magnifiers
customer_reviews.text: nice magnifiers with all kinds of adjustments. multiple lenses easily pop in and out. head strap a nice ulternative.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for the bridge of my nose
customer_reviews.text: Loved this magnifier at first but then wearing them became very troublesome. After about 10 minutes, all the weight of the lenses was on the bridge of my nose. I bought plastic nose guards but that didn't help. I'm looking for different magnifiers again.
customer_reviews.author: Penny S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product love the different lenses The only flaw is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product love the different lenses The only flaw is that the lenses clip in very light and a slight bump and the lens flies of the holder other then that great product
customer_reviews.author: AlienWish

customer_reviews.title: I bought the Fancii headband light. For my son ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Fancii headband light .For my son he needed it for shop. So far he likes it. Thank you .
customer_reviews.author: Candyland

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool if you are a hobbyist and working on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool if you are a hobbyist and working on things like delicate construction, repair. High quality and good value.
customer_reviews.author: mhp

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and love the fact that changing lenses is quick and easy. I would definitely recommend this item to friends! I bought this for cross stitch work but works well also for working on slot cars.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Magnifier that I have used and I wish I had purchased this months ago. A very well built and helpful product. Just finished soldering some small wires. It's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Patrick N Elsass

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can see what I am working on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can see what I am working on but I can easily hop up to let the dog out, or refill my coffee and still see easily around the sides of the magnifying glass (plastic)> the product appears very well made. It is comfortable and the lens very clear. I have only had it less than a week but so far I am impressed with performance. Dont forget to buy your own batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Excellent Values
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Great Value. Very pleasantly surprised by excellent quality. Just as advertised and delivered on schedule.
customer_reviews.author: B. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Works great to see up close!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good pair of craft glasses for awhile, and these are perfect for all my uses. I was amazed at the many choices for magnifying options, and the ease of changing lenses. Will recommend these to all of my crafting friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bunker RV

customer_reviews.title: I can see!
customer_reviews.text: It is everything that I hoped for. It gives me hands-free magnification while wearing my glasses. And I have a choice of magnifications. I am very pleased. +++++ +
customer_reviews.author: Merle  J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very versatile. Only issue is that the rubber on the arm where it sits near your ear was peeling away from the plastic immediately, I’ll glue and continue to use or use the handy elastic strap instead. I love how it come with so many options and everything is adjustable from the fit to the angles of the lenses and light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Value around; and they REALLY Work
customer_reviews.text: Lighted, magnifying close-up "glasses" have a wide range of quality, utility and price. These are comfortable, not terribly heavy, and come with a selection of lens of magnification. The lighting is wonderful and easily aimed; plus it doesn't blind onlookers if you glance up. Best part; fantastic PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: terry palus

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: You get way more than you pay for with this one. Lenses and lights are perfect. Comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Nose bridge is uncomfortable otherwise I would have given it a five
customer_reviews.text: After having cataract surgery these work perfectly for the close-up tasks of games and crafts as my normal readers don’t give me sufficient power.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: The only issue I am having a problem with is ...
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I am having a problem with is switching the earpiece for the headband. The button doesn't seem to want to depress enough to allow removable of earpiece, but it just may need to get broken in first.
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful magnifier, very comfortable and great for my jewelry making.
customer_reviews.author: fionnuala

customer_reviews.title: You can see small script or projects with ease!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely positively love it, it makes reading and sewing - even embroidery so much easier with this headband light. It has multiple lens strengths to choose from. It is a tad bit heavy on the nose so I just pull it down on the bridge of the nose which also allows me to look over it to see things in the distance.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Preston Beasley

customer_reviews.title: versatile
customer_reviews.text: variety of lenses makes this set a good choice. a little uncomfortable at first but very useful.
customer_reviews.author: tom wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, quality construction, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and comfortable. Easy to change lenses. Great lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fredericksen

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and very easy to use. Changing the len is very simple and the LED light helps illuminate the magnified area. Product was delivered on time and was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Toni M

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dental lab Techs too!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in the Dental Lab class I am taking, and they work great! I have to have my hair up, so wearing a band around my head wasn’t working. Love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka  Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother in-law for sewing and she loves them. The light was also a huge bonus for her as well. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Genavie Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. It took a little to get used to it. I use it for puzzling and knitting. My husband uses it for working around the house in dark corners.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Its ReallyReally NICE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its ReallyReally NICE !!!! Much Nicer Than I Thought It Would Be !!! Just Buy It ! You Won’t Be Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Gil LopezTop Contributor: Sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: If a person wears glasses this headset can be worn over them.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with my new headset, it allows me to work with my coins hands free. It is comfortable and light weight and i believe with proper care and gentle handling it will be in service for a good while. If however, it becomes broken i will be looking at you Fancii to sell me another one.I am completely satisfied, Thank You well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Good helpful product.
customer_reviews.text: Why this little gadget can really help! I could see what I’m working on now, great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Victorino

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product well packaged, the led light is an awesome addition. The only think I didn’t like is that when lifting and lowering the lenses the lenses can fall out. So you have to be careful. Other wise good product well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: It was for my wife, not me. She likes it a lot but she mentioned it's a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: jon dot org

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and bought this one for my mom who has glaucoma and trouble reading! She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Rita L. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great product; very versatile. It has made work much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Newman

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far this looks like a great buy! It comes with 5 different magnification lenses and they are crystal clear and the focal length is such that it will work great for the inlay tasks I have planned. The light is aimable so you can point it exactly where you need it too. It may be a bit of a challenge for me to wear this over my regular glasses, but luckily my eyesight is not too bad so I can get by without them.
customer_reviews.author: GoLouavull

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for locksmith work. Great job on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good for craft work.
customer_reviews.text: Nose piece is a little uncomfortable so I can't wear too long.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Raemer

customer_reviews.title: nose piece is adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: really helps me with my detail work on the embrodery I do. I put nose pads on it because it gets heavy after awhile with my regular glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Since I have become the family/friends smart phone, etc
customer_reviews.text: Since I have become the family/friends smart phone, etc. repair person, this has been a great help for my old eyes.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely impressed with the quality of these glasses. They fit very nicely on my nose along with my glasses. The headband attachment was a must since I already wear glasses.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: ... actually use it for anything yet but it seems like it is going to work well
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to actually use it for anything yet but it seems like it is going to work well. This arrived quickly and seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! I’m visually impaired with macular degeneration and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I’m visually impaired with macular degeneration and I’ve found this system to be wonderfully useful. I consider this a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Lenses are just a little narrow for my big fat American head.
customer_reviews.author: Reg Mason

product_meta.title: Fancii Headband LED Illuminated Head Magnifier Visor - 1X to 3.5X Zoom with 5 Detachable Lenses - Hands Free Head Worn Lighted Magnifying Glasses for Reading, Jewelry Loupe, Watch & Electronic Repair
feature_bullets: INTERCHANGEABLE LENS DESIGN: Switch between 5 optical lenses using a simple click and release system. Magnification power: 1X, 1.5X, 2X, 2.5X, 3.5X
COMFORTABLE AND STYLISH: Lightweight ergonomic frame with soft padding suitable for all head sizes. Fits over your reading glasses
VERSATILE: Best for examining intricate details in engraving, electronic parts, watches, jewelry, coins, stamps, dental work, hobbies and crafts
HEADBAND MODE: Alternate between wearing it as glasses or headband. The included head strap can be attached with ease to ensure a more secure fit
BRIGHT HEADLIGHTS: Two energy-efficient LEDs with rotatable angle; turn on or off with a simple switch on the top of the headset (Batteries NOT included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars417 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
